label.style: line-clamp: 2; text-stroke: 2px @Color_BG_L2; line-height: 28px; color: {namecolor}; font-size: 24px; font-weight: bold; max-width: 196px; text-layout-amap: Y

div.style: display: {info}; height: 30px; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; border-radius: 8px; background-color: @Color_BG_L2(99)

width: 26px; height: 26px; align-items: center; flex-direction: column; margin-right: 4px; margin-left: 2px; border-radius: 8px; background-color: @Color_Hue220_H6; font-weight: medium; line-height: 28px

label.style: line-height: 20px; color: @Color_Hue220_H6; font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal; margin-right: 4px
